C

categoryMovie() - Method in class movieServer.Connection
This method is for generating a random movie based on a category provided by the user.
Connection(Socket) - Constructor for class movieServer.Connection
This class initializes the connection between the server and the client and a new connection will be made for every new client.

D

Disconnect() - Method in class movieClient
This method disconnects the client from the server and sets isConnected to false

I

IncomingReader() - Constructor for class movieClient.IncomingReader
 

L

ListenThread() - Method in class movieClient
This method Initializes a new Thread to Listen the Incoming reader from the server

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class movieClient
This is the main method which runs when the file is compiled.
main(String[]) - Static method in class movieServer
This is the main method which runs when the file is compiled.
movieClient - Class in <Unnamed>
The Movie Client class creates a client(s) that can communicate with the Multi-Threaded server to get random movie recommendations.
movieClient() - Constructor for class movieClient
This method acts like a constructor for this class that initializes the GUI components of the client.
movieClient.IncomingReader - Class in <Unnamed>
This method is used to process the Incoming Reader from the server and keeps reading until its null.
movieServer - Class in <Unnamed>
The Movie Server class creates a multi-threaded server that can accept multiple client requests at the same time.
movieServer() - Constructor for class movieServer
This method acts like a constructor for this class that initializes the GUI components of the server.
movieServer.Connection - Class in <Unnamed>
This class initializes the Connection between the server and the client and a new connection will be made for every new client.
movieServer.Server - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the class where the Threads are created for each clients when the Server is initialized.

R

randomMovie() - Method in class movieServer.Connection
This method is for generating a random movie from a text file in the same directory called randomMoviesList.txt.
run() - Method in class movieClient.IncomingReader
 
run() - Method in class movieServer.Connection
This method is from the Runnable package and automatically runs whenever a connection is initialized.
run() - Method in class movieServer.Server
 

S

Server() - Constructor for class movieServer.Server
